description: Describes an existing model defined for a RestApi resource.

parameters.name: restApiId
parameters.description: The RestApi identifier under which the Model exists.

parameters.name: modelName
parameters.description: The name of the model as an identifier.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The identifier for the model resource.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the model. Must be an alphanumeric string.

nested_items.name: schema
nested_items.description: The schema for the model. For application/json models, this should be JSON schema draft 4 model. Do not include '*/' characters in the description of any properties because such '*/' characters may be interpreted as the closing marker for comments in some languages, such as Java or JavaScript, causing the installation of your API's SDK generated by API Gateway to fail.
